title: Space Engineers v01.011.008 [Portable Steam Rip]
description:
!!!Support for 64bit version is limited. As such, read the 64bit Readme for help. If it fails to work, use the 32bit version - there is no substantial difference!!!


PS ~ Keen Software (the devs) decided to implement a stealthed dll-hook that hooks itself to your local network upon launch of the game. Various information is then relayed back to them; information such as who is or is not using legitimate copies of Space Engineers, the IP of your machine and the guid of the user, amongst many other things. A simplistic batch file to fix this has been included. The 64bit version is also included. If you experience errors with it, leave a comment.

Space Engineers v01.011.008 [Portable Steam Rip]
*32bit Version Enabled.
*64bit Version Enabled.

Two step run process.
1. Extract using 7zip, WinRar or an archiver of the same variety.
2. Run

* No Installation
* No Crack
* No Steam
* No Hassle

You need to have .NET Framework 4.0 installed. Link below. <a href="
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718</a>

Seed for others once your download completes; it makes everyone's lives more beautiful.

Support the devs if you enjoyed! - http://www.spaceengineersgame.com


Notes:

* Direct Steam Rip. All content (excluding the .NET Framework 4.0, DotNet 4.0 and the 2010/2012 vcredist Redistributables) is included.
* Support for 64bit version is limited. As such, read the 64bit Readme for help. If it fails to work, use the 32bit version - there is no substantial difference between the two.
* The Steam Workshop is Disabled
* Portable Release (can be stored and played on a memory device)


Space Engineers v01.011.008 Changelog

Build: 2013-12-20 12:03

Update 01.011.006/7/8 has been released. We have implemented the small and large warhead blocks. Warhead blocks, can be used in order to create torpedoes and bombs, dig tunnels and create mine fields. Warheads explode on contact or when damaged.

Features
- added small and large warhead blocks
- added warhead explosion on impact

Fixes
- fixed snapping of pasted stations
- fixed torque unit; unit is in Nm and its multiples
- removed zoom sound
- fixed automatic rifle sound

EDIT: Update 01.011.007

Fixes
- fixed building issue
- fixed copy/paste snapping issue

Update 01.011.008
Fixes
- fixed GUI crash
- fixed explosion crash
